title: Spicy bean cakes with mango salsa and crispy potato wedges
description: A burger and chips doesn't have to be unhealthy: swap beef for beans and pulses and serve with fresh mango salsa.
ingredients: 200g/7oz red lentils, cooked according to packet instructions
1 small red chilli, seeds removed and finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1.5kg/3lb 5oz Maris Piper potatoes, cut into wedges
handful fresh coriander, chopped, plus extra for garnish
2-3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, to drizzle
small handful of mint leaves, chopped
